name: Twitter - Modern
description: Changes twitter layout to be a bit more modern. Because this an early but usable release there are bound to be bugs. If so please Tweet me or create a discussion below. This design was based of a brilliant concept design from Kerem Suer (Check him out!)

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch
